description: Get bomber placements with these wired hexes. They create a camming action in parallel sided cracks, and are way lighter than a big rack of cams. You do have to find the right spot to seat them, but the tapered sides allow a great range of placement options.Set of 7 hexes, from size 4 to 10.Sides are tapered so piece can be placed sideways in constrictions.One hex fits four different crack configurations.Made of colour-coded aluminum with steel wires.
name: Black Diamond Wired Hexentric Set #4-10
